Fidentity uses high definition cameras with infrared feature, for induction and verification purposes. How Does it Work ? Step-1: Take the snapshot of a delivery package label from mobile or tablet using Fidentity delivery app. Step-2: Fidentity automatically processes the label data and identifies the employee from your employee directory. Step-3: Fidentity sends recipient notification to the employee about their package delivery to pick up. How Does it Work ? Step-1: Take the snapshot of a delivery package label from mobile or tablet using Fidentity delivery app. Step-2: Fidentity automatically processes the label data and identifies the employee from your employee directory. Step-3: Fidentity sends recipient notification to the employee about their package delivery to pick up.
